dataList.dlg: Oh~ So it’s you? You’re the one who’ll be bossing me around?
You really woke up this late? Doesn’t your head have an alarm or something?
Weather’s just right for some exercise. Are you gonna stand there and watch? Well, go right on ahead then.
A quiet night. Moon’s not too bright… Perfect for infiltration.
You should be grateful that I joined you. You’re gabbing with a skilled worker here.
Gotta say~ The crew here is way below my class. Especially that one who screams all the time—ain’t that a sign of hysteria?
No need to make it long. Just tell me where to go and what to deal with. I’ll make sure to handle the rest.
I wasn’t this confident at the start. …I just had to become like this.

The Preliminary Observation Department’s damn expendable if we’re being real. They toss staff into danger all willy-nilly. No wonder it’s got five whole sections… Well, does pay well for what it’s worth.
Got a lot of free time on your hands, huh? Why don’tcha quit loitering and come help me document these instead, hun.
A promotion at last? What’s on the table? A raise? Transfer to the After Team? …Neither? Phooey.
Ah, geez. Reporting in~
Yeah, yeah. Heading to the mission area~ Rodya out!
Hm? Ya need something?
Rodya, engaging enemy forces!
Target’s incapacitated.
Tch…!
Target neutralization confirmed!
Shoot, we’ve got an injured unit! …Or even worse?
Had a gut feeling it was the red wire!
Hmm… Was I supposed to cut the red wire…?
Ahh, ahh. Observation complete~ Isn’t this too much of a cakewalk?
Mission objectives all met! Returning to base now~ Rodya out!
Pah… Mission failed. Tsk, talk about a downer.
